item.description: That's correct ladies and gentleman you will now have all your entertainment needs met under one roof all in one night. Starting at 730pm on Wednesday Nights we will start Trivia this is Interactive Game show style Trivia where you remotely BUZZ in your response, no pen and paper here. Just fast paced, thought provoking questions to keep you on your toes. We place 4 rounds with a winner each round and an over winner for the team or individual that tallies the most points that night. Immediately following Trivia we will Rock the Rosebud with another night of Karaoke, we currently do Sunday and Tuesdays and we hope that Wednesday rock the house as well. So what ever your poison we got it. Great fun, food, drink and most importantly people. See you then.
item.name: Trivi-oke A fun-filled night of Game Show Style Trivia followed by Karaoke
